title: Wolfenstein II The New Colossus Update 2 incl DLC-CODEX
description:
C O D E X
P R E S E N T S

Wolfenstein II: The New Colossus Update 2 incl DLC (c) Bethesda Softworks
Release Date: 11/2017 Protection: Steam
Discs: 1 Genre: Action

For list of changes read included patchnotes.txt

Extract
Run setup.exe and install update
Copy crack from CODEX dir to installdir
Play

NOTES: the following DLC is included:
Wolfenstein II: The Freedom Chronicles - Episode 0

You need the following releases for this:

Wolfenstein.II.The.New.Colossus-CODEX
Wolfenstein.II.The.New.Colossus.Update.1-CODEX

Block the game's exe in your firewall to prevent the game from
trying to go online
If you install games to your systemdrive, it may be necessary
to run this game with admin privileges instead

parsed.dn: Wolfenstein II The New Colossus Update 2 incl DLC-CODEX
parsed.name: Wolfenstein II The New Colossus Update 2 incl DLC-CODEX
